subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] I have had enough!
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
I have no interest in "demons." In fact, I wonder if they even really
exist. I have never encountered one.

I do have a lot of ghost recordings. So far, all I've gotten indicate
they are/were just people like you and me.

Zack


On 3/18/11, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>  I've had enough of the stupid demon infested, all Holloween, paranormal BS.
> That can not possibly get any further away from spirit, and what spirit
> communication really is, and what it is for. You all can follow the childish
> crap is ya want, but I will not particapate. I will not make anymore boxes
> for people that want to run around in the dark chasing evil, and trying to
> get a fear rush going.
>
>  Already dumped one group this week, I can dump this one too. Y'all can't
> hear one freaking thing I say anyway.
>
> Frank-S
>
